option.kronhud.shadow.comment: Whether to display a shadow underneath text.
option.kronhud.keystrokehud.mousemovemen: Enable this to add a section to the keystrokes that displays mouse movement.
The crosshair color (when targeting an entity).
option.kronhud.crosshairhud.blockcolor.c: The crosshair color (when targeting a container).
option.kronhud.crosshairhud.showInF5.com: Whether to show the crosshair in F5 or not.
option.kronhud.cpshud.cpskeybind.comment: Calculate the CPS from Attack and Use keybindings.
option.kronhud.cpshud.rightcps.comment: Display CPS for the right mouse button.
The color of the axis label.
option.kronhud.coordshud.secondtextcolor: The color of the axis value.
option.kronhud.coordshud.decimalplaces.c: The number of decimal places to round the coordinates to.
option.kronhud.coordshud.minimal.comment: Toggle minimalist coordinates mode. Direction not included.
option.kronhud.scoreboardhud.topbackgrou: The top of the scoreboard's background color.
option.kronhud.scoreboardhud.scores.comm: Whether to show the scores (redundant on many servers).
option.kronhud.arrowhud.dynamic.comment: Only show the counter when a bow is held.
option.kronhud.arrowhud.allArrowTypes.co:
Show the total sum of all arrow types.
When disabled it will choose the arrow type that will be fired.
option.kronhud.actionbarhud.timeshown.co: The time to render the text for.
option.kronhud.actionbarhud.customtextco: Whether to use the custom text color.
option.kronhud.itemupdatehud.timeout.com: How long each entry is displayed for.
option.kronhud.togglesprint.toggleSprint: Whether to allow toggling sprint with the bound key.
Whether to allow toggling sneak with the bound key.
option.kronhud.togglesprint.randomPlaceh: Whether to use a random placeholder from Minecraft's splash texts.
The Placeholder to use when no keys are pressed/toggled.
hud.kronhud.armorhud.info: A HUD component to show held items and armor
hud.kronhud.arrowhud.info: A HUD component to show the amount of arrows in your inventory
hud.kronhud.cpshud.info: A simple text component to show CPS. Right/left click can be enabled
hud.kronhud.fpshud.info: A simple text component to show FPS
hud.kronhud.iphud.info: A simple text component to show current IP to server
hud.kronhud.speedhud.info: A simple text component to view player speed
hud.kronhud.itemupdatehud.info: A HUD component that shows updates to inventory status
hud.kronhud.keystrokehud.info: A HUD component to view keystrokes
hud.kronhud.pinghud.info: A simple text component to show current ping to server
hud.kronhud.potionshud.info: A HUD component to show potions
hud.kronhud.coordshud.info: A HUD component to show coordinate information
hud.kronhud.togglesprint.info: A HUD component to show sprint/sneak information
hud.kronhud.playerhud.info: Renders a smaller version of the player model
hud.kronhud.reachhud.info: Shows how far away your last hit was
texts.kronhud.optiontype.info.hudconfig: Enable/Disable this module from showing. Modify specific options by clicking the gear.
option.kronhud.justification.comment: This option changes how the text is aligned
option.kronhud.anchorpoint.comment: The point that this object is anchored to if it changes sizes. If set to the top left, the top left position won't change, but the width and height of it will expand downwards and to the left.
option.kronhud.minwidth.comment: Minimum width of the component (it will automatically expand)
option.kronhud.irltimehud.dateformat.com:
Date format to render time from. This works with any specification from the &dJava 8 Date Time Formatter
&7https://docs.oracle.com/javase/8/docs/api/java/time/format/DateTimeFormatter.html
option.kronhud.gametimehud.is12hour.comm: Whether the clock should display 24 hour time or 12 hour time
option.kronhud.gametimehud.showsleep.com: An indicator that lights up whenever it's possible to sleep
option.kronhud.gametimehud.showclock.com: Displays a clock item next to the digital display
option.kronhud.compasshud.invert.comment: Inverts the direction that the compass moves
option.kronhud.compasshud.lookingbox.com: The color of the small line on the display in the direct center
option.kronhud.compasshud.degreescolor.c: The color of the degrees text below the center
The color of &7N E S W
option.kronhud.compasshud.semicardinalco: The color of &7NE SE SW NW
option.kronhud.compasshud.majorindicator: The color of the long lines (every 90 degrees)
option.kronhud.compasshud.minorindicator: The color of the short lines (every 15 degrees)
option.kronhud.compasshud.showdegrees.co: Displays the current degree of rotation
option.kronhud.general.edithud.info: Keybind to open the screen to edit the HUD
Padding around the title component on the scoreboard
option.kronhud.playerhud.dynamicrotation: Rotation of the player is shown and then slowly turns back to looking straight
